item.title: Docker Compose | Profiles
item.description: Docker Compose | Profiles directive Question I was trying to have smart separtion between different development environments for our project. Fox example only run selected services when developing frontend locally, or run different set of services when developing backend locally. Answer For now we are using docker-compose.override.yml. But I found out there is profiles directive https://github.com/compose-spec/compose-spec/blob/master/spec.md#profiles
